title: Science Food Basics
description: Learn about food needs, types, sources, and habits for Class 1 students.

subtopics.title: Why Do We Need Food?
subtopics.content:
## Importance of Food

We eat food because it:

- Gives us energy to play, study, and work.
- Helps us grow strong and tall.
- Keeps us healthy and fit.
- Helps us fight diseases.

Without food, we cannot live.
subtopics.codeExample:
### Food Questions:
- Why do we need food for energy?
- How does food help us grow?
- What happens without food?

### Practice:
- List reasons for eating food
- Match food benefits
- True or false statements

subtopics.title: Types of Food and Advantages
subtopics.content:
## Food Types

- **Energy foods**: Rice, bread, butter, sugar, chapatti - Gives energy to work and play.
- **Growth foods**: Milk, eggs, meat, fish, pulses - Helps grow strong.
- **Protective foods**: Fruits and vegetables - Keeps healthy and fights sickness.
subtopics.codeExample:
### Food Type Questions:
- Name an energy food.
- What do growth foods do?
- Give examples of protective foods.

### Practice:
- Classify foods by type
- Match foods to benefits
- Identify healthy foods

subtopics.title: Food from Animals
subtopics.content:
## Animal Food Sources

Foods from animals:

- Cow: milk, curd, ghee
- Hen: eggs
- Goat/Chicken: meat
- Honeybee: honey

Good habits: Wash hands before/after eating, eat clean food, eat at proper times, drink water, no waste.
subtopics.codeExample:
### Source Questions:
- What food from cow?
- Which animal gives eggs?
- Name good eating habits.

### Practice:
- Match animals to foods
- List eating habits
- Identify animal foods
